items.question: What is ReplAInow AI Helpdesk?
items.shortAnswer: ReplAInow is an AI-powered customer support solution for Shopify with GPT-4 technology.
items.detailedAnswer: ReplAInow is an AI-powered customer support solution for Shopify that automatically responds to customer queries, provides product recommendations, and is available in 32+ languages. The software uses GPT-4 technology for precise, human-like responses and integrates seamlessly into existing Shopify stores.

items.question: How much does ReplAInow cost?
items.shortAnswer: ReplAInow starts at $19/month with a 14-day free trial.
items.detailedAnswer: ReplAInow starts at $19/month for the Starter plan. Other plans: Pro ($49/month), Scale ($199/month). All plans include a 14-day free trial with no setup fees and unlimited AI responses.

items.question: Is ReplAInow GDPR compliant?
items.shortAnswer: Yes, ReplAInow is fully GDPR compliant and meets all EU data protection requirements.
items.detailedAnswer: Yes, ReplAInow is fully GDPR compliant and meets all European data protection requirements. All customer data is securely encrypted during transmission and storage, with full transparency about data processing and deletion rights.

items.question: Which languages does ReplAInow support?
items.shortAnswer: ReplAInow natively supports 32+ languages including English, German, Spanish, French.
items.detailedAnswer: ReplAInow natively supports 32+ languages including English, German, Spanish, Italian, Dutch, Portuguese, French, and more. The AI automatically detects customer language and responds accordingly, with no translation errors.

items.question: How fast does ReplAInow AI respond?
items.shortAnswer: ReplAInow responds in under 3 seconds with accurate, contextual answers.
items.detailedAnswer: ReplAInow responds in under 3 seconds with accurate, contextual answers. The AI analyzes customer queries, accesses real-time Shopify data, and provides personalized responses faster than any human agent.
